name: Golden Gorget of Leoric
flavorText: Despite the powerful enchantments upon it, this ornate piece of armor nonetheless failed to stop noble Lachdanan from ending the life of the Mad King.
flavorTextHtml: Despite the powerful enchantments upon it, this ornate piece of armor nonetheless failed to stop noble Lachdanan from ending the life of the Mad King.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [8.0 - 10.0]%
+[91 - 100] Resistance to All Elements

secondary.textHtml: After earning a massacre bonus, 6 Skeletons are summoned to fight by your side for 10 seconds. [4 - 6]
